Come tour our beautiful hilltop campus overlooking Lake Champlain and the Adirondack Mountains. Discover our world-class academics, career-focused majors, award-winning faculty, amazing student life, inclusive community, and innovative, hands-on approach to learning.
Experience for yourself all the ways Champlain College is a school unlike any other.
Get a behind-the-scenes look at everything we do. Meet us at the Perry Hall Welcome Center.
Applications are open to start in Fall 2020. We encourage you to apply as early as possible.

We believe coming to campus is the best way to understand what a college offers. We feel so strongly about this, we are offering a $4,000 scholarship to be applied toward tuition costs simply for experiencing a great day with us on our campus.
Burlington's small-town charm and big-city vibe lets you live the best of both worlds. The backdrop to it all: stunning Lake Champlain and mountains everywhere you look.
Refer a Friend and Get  Champlain Hoodies for the Two of You!

Have a friend who is a junior or senior in high school who is looking at colleges? If you are planning to visit us, we'd love for you to invite them to come with you. When you register to visit, you'll have the opportunity to refer-a-friend right on the registration form.

The views from campus will blow your mind. Plus, there are the Victorian-era mansions you'll get to call home. Our unique Upside-Down Curriculum lets you jump into your major—or start exploring what interests you most—right on day one. And to top it off, 94% of our 2018 grads scored jobs just six months after graduating.
